scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build && cd ../docs && npm run build
scripts.watch-server: nodemon --ext . --watch server --ignore dist/ --exec "cd server && npm run build && npm run start"
scripts.watch-client: nodemon --ext . --watch client --ignore dist/ --exec "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.watch-docs: nodemon --ext . --watch docs --ignore dist/ --exec "cd docs && npm run build"
scripts.watch: npx concurrently "npm run watch-server" "npm run watch-client" "npm run watch-docs"
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i && cd ../docs && npm i
